modName: BloodMoon - A Rogue In The Dark
summary:
V1.01
fix the path of hair textures
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Foreword-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]

Apology for my bad English, it is not my first language, please excuse me for using google translate on responses.

This mod adds a new follower.

This mod always need [color=#00ffff][b][u]Dawnguard[/u][/b][/color] and [color=#00ffff][b][u]Dragonborn[/u][/b][/color],[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32﻿[/url], or you may crash to desk when you try to take her cloth,FOR NOW Moon is using 7B body,other kind of bodies vision is coming.

V1.01
fix the path of hair textures
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-How to find her-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
Go to [b][u]The Ragged Flagon[/u] .[/b]
You can see she.


[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]-Description-[/b][/size][/color][/font][/center]
[size=3]This is a simple follower mod[/size] .
[size=3]I make my friend  [b]ymokhere's [/b][/size]CME_save [size=3]to this mod.

[/size][size=3]name:BloodMoon
level:the same to your char,max 255
[/size][size=3]perk:Heavy Armor ﻿Light Armor ﻿Archery ﻿One-Handed ﻿Sneak
outfit:[/size][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D50814%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1380980&pUp=1][size=3]Scarlet Dawn Armor 7B Cleavage BBP [/size][/url][size=3]
[/size]weapon:EbonyDagger*2

[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Installation-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
Just use NMM to install it or simply extract files to skyrim/data
